nodes.text: Bay Two was a launch bay located on the wall of Hangar Six onboard the First Order's Resurgent-class Star Destroyer Finalizer. In 34 ABY, the Resistance pilot Poe Dameron and the stormtrooper Finn stole a TIE/sf space superiority fighter from Bay Two, but discovered that it was still connected to the bay by a fuel cable. While Dameron detached the cable, Finn opened fire on First Order forces within the hangar, after which the two escaped from the Star Destroyer and into the Jakku system.
